links.description: March 14- Tesla Inc said the number of labor hours needed to produce its Model S and Model X cars have decreased considerably, following the latest report of quality problems that could prevent the carmaker from hitting its production targets.

links.title: Tesla execs sneakily start a reusable materials company
links.description: Redwood Materials, a new reusable materials startup, might have close ties to energy giant, Tesla. An SEC filing, first spotted by CB Insights, revealed that Redwood Materials had listed J.B. Straubel (Tesla's CTO) and Andrew Stevenson (Tesla's head of Special Projects) as executive officers.
